## Util Package

The **Util Python Package** is a python package that contains Some useful Functions


###  Install

```
$ pip install utilbdb  
```

### Usage

Open a Python console, import the module Utils, create an instance of it and call its method get_json_value() or get_system_usage(). ðŸ˜‰

```
>> from utilbdb import Utils_BDB
>>
>> util_obj = Utils_BDB()
>> util_obj.get_json_value()
```
